column1: *The statistical data for Israel are supplied by and under the responsibility of the relevant Israeli authorities. The use of such data by the OECD is without prejudice to the status of the Golan Heights, East Jerusalem and Israeli settlements in the West Bank under the terms of international law.

1. The data refers to all voting members of the House. 
2. Data do not include the 36 special rotating delegates appointed on an ad hoc basis
